understanding.developer_understanding_on_unclear_metho: The unclear code is related to the initialization of a GCInspector object, which involves querying and registering GarbageCollectorMXBeans
understanding.developer_understanding_on_unclear_code_: The unclear code is responsible for setting up the GCInspector object, which is likely used to monitor and manage garbage collection in the application. The configuration description provided indicates that GC pauses greater than 200 ms will be logged at INFO level, and this threshold can be adjusted. It is possible that the unclear code is part of the process that monitors GC pauses and logs them based on the specified configuration.

config_description: GC Pauses greater than 200 ms will be logged at INFO level This threshold can be adjusted to minimize logging if necessary
developer_understanding_on_working: The configuration 'gc_log_threshold_in_ms' sets a threshold for logging GC pauses greater than the specified value (200 ms) at INFO level. This threshold can be adjusted to control the amount of logging.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The configuration is triggered whenever a GC pause occurs that exceeds the specified threshold of 200 ms.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the 'gc_log_threshold_in_ms' configuration option on the system is that it affects the amount of logging related to GC pauses. Setting a higher threshold will result in less frequent logging of GC pauses, while setting a lower threshold will increase the amount of logging.
